name: CORAL
quote: Yes, Marlin. No, I see it. It's beautiful.

name: MARLIN
quote: So, Coral, when you said you wanted an ocean view, you didn't think that we we're gonna get the whole ocean, did you? Huh? [sighs] Oh yeah. A fish can breath out here. Did your man deliver or did he deliver?

name: CORAL
quote: Because a lot of other clownfish had their eyes on this place.

name: MARLIN
quote: You better believe they did--every single one of them.

name: CORAL
quote: Mm-hmm. You did good. And the neighborhood is awesome.

name: MARLIN
quote: So, you do like it, don't you?

name: CORAL
quote: No, no. I do, I do. I really do like it. But Marlin, I know that the drop off is desirable with the great schools and the amazing view and all, but do we really need so much space?

name: MARLIN
quote: Coral, honey, these are our kids we're talking about. They deserve the best. Look, look, look. They'll wake up, poke their little heads out and they'll see a whale! See, right by their bedroom window.

name: CORAL
quote: Shhh, you're gonna wake the kids.

name: CORAL
quote: Aww, look. They're dreaming. We still have to name them.

name: MARLIN
quote: You wanna name all of 'em, right now? All right, we'll name this half Marlin Jr. and then this half Coral Jr. Okay, we're done.

name: MARLIN
quote: Nemo? Well, we'll name one Nemo but I'd like most of them to be Marlin Jr.

name: CORAL
quote: Just think that in a couple of days, we're gonna be parents!

name: MARLIN
quote: Yeah. What if they don't like me?

name: CORAL
quote: There's over 400 eggs. Odds are, one of them is bound to like you.

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, I remember. 'Excuse me, miss, can you check and see if there's a hook in my lip?'

name: MARLIN
quote: 'Well, you gotta look a little closer because it's wiggling'.

name: MARLIN
quote: Here he is. Cutie's here! Where did everybody go?

name: MARLIN
quote: [gasps] Coral, get inside the house, Coral. No, Coral, don't. They'll be fine. Just get inside, you, right now.

name: MARLIN
quote: Ohh. There, there, there. It's okay, daddy's here. Daddy's got you. I promise, I will never let anything happen to you...Nemo.

name: NEMO
quote: First day of school! First day of school! Wake up, wake up! C'mon, first day of school!

name: MARLIN
quote: I don't wanna go to school. Five more minutes.

name: NEMO
quote: Get up, get up! It's time for school! It's time for school! It's time for school! It's time for school! Oh boy! Oh boy!

name: MARLIN
quote: [gasps] Nemo, don't move! Don't move! You'll never get out of there yourself. I'll do it. All right, where's the break? You feel a break?

name: MARLIN
quote: Sometimes you can't tell 'cause fluid is rushing to the area. Now, any rushing fluids?

name: MARLIN
quote: How many stripes do I have?

name: MARLIN
quote: No! See, something's wrong with you. I have one, two, three--that's all I have? Oh, you're okay. How's the lucky fin?

name: MARLIN
quote: Are you sure you wanna go to school this year? 'Cause there's no problem if you don't. You can wait 5 or 6 years.

name: NEMO
quote: Come on, dad. It's time for school.

name: MARLIN
quote: Do you want this anemone to sting you?

name: MARLIN
quote: There. Ha ha! Right there. And here and here and here!

name: MARLIN
quote: All right, we're excited. First day of school, here we go. We're ready to learn to get some knowledge. Now, what's the one thing we have to remember about the ocean?

name: MARLIN
quote: That's my boy. So, first we check to see that the coast is clear. We go out and back in. And then we go out, and back in. And then one more time--out and back in. And sometimes, if you wanna do it four times--

name: NEMO
quote: Dad, maybe while I'm at school, I'll see a shark!

name: NEMO
quote: Have you ever met a shark?

name: MARLIN
quote: No, and I don't plan to.

name: NEMO
quote: Sandy Plankton from next door, he said that sea turtles, said that they live to be about a hundred years old!

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, you know what, if I ever meet a sea turtle, I'll ask him. After I'm done talking to the shark, okay? Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hold on, hold on, wait to cross. Hold my fin, hold my fin.

name: NEMO
quote: Dad, you're not gonna freak out like you did at the petting zoo, are you?

name: MARLIN
quote: Hey, that snail was about to charge. Hmm, I wonder where we're supposed to go.

name: FISH MOM
quote: I'll pick you up after school.

name: CRAB KID
quote: Come on, you guys. Stop it! Give it back!

name: MARLIN
quote: Come on, we'll try over there.

name: MARLIN
quote: Excuse me, is this where we meet his teacher?

name: BOB
quote: Well, look who's out of the anemone.

name: BILL
quote: Bill. Hey, you're a clownfish. You're funny, right? Hey, tell us a joke.

name: BOB/TED
quote: Yeah, yeah. Come on, give us a funny one.

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, actually, that's a common misconception. Clownfish are no funnier than any other fish.

name: MARLIN
quote: All right, I   know one joke. Um, there's a mollusk, see? And he walks up to a sea, well he doesn't walk   up, he swims up. Well, actually the mollusk isn't moving. He's in one place and then the   sea cucumber, well they--I mixed up. There was a mollusk and a sea cucumber. None of them   were walking, so forget that I--

name: BOB
quote: Sheldon! Get out of Mr. Johansenn's yard, now!

name: MR. JOHANSSEN
quote: All right, you kids! Ooh! Uuh, where'd you go? Where'd you go? Where, where'd you go?

name: NEMO
quote: Dad, dad...can I go play too? Can I?

name: MARLIN
quote: I would feel better if you go play over on the sponge beds.

name: SHELDON
quote: Ow! Hey, what'd I do? What'd I do?

name: BOB
quote: Be nice. It's his first time at school.

name: MARLIN
quote: He was born with it, kids. We call it his lucky fin.

name: PEARL
quote: See this tentacle? It's actually shorter than all my other tentacles but you can't really tell.Especially when I twirl them like this.

name: MR. RAY
quote: [singing] Oooh, let's name the zones, the zones, the zones. Let's name the zones of the open sea.

name: MARLIN
quote: Whoa, you better stay with me.

name: MR. RAY
quote: [singing]..mesopolagic, bathyal, abyssalpelagic. All the rest are too deep for you and me to see.

name: MR. RAY
quote: Huh, I wonder where my class has gone?

name: MR. RAY
quote: Oh, there you are. Climb aboard, explorers. [singing] Oh, knowledge exploring is oh so lyrical, when you think thoughts that are empirical.

name: MR. RAY
quote: Well, Nemo, all new explorers must answer a science question.

name: MR. RAY
quote: You live in what kind of home?

name: MR. RAY
quote: Okay, okay, don't hurt yourself. Welcome aboard, explorers!

name: MARLIN
quote: Just so you know, he's got a little fin. I find if he's having trouble swimming, let him take a break. Ten, fifteen minutes.

name: NEMO
quote: Dad, it's time for you to go now.

name: MR. RAY
quote: Don't worry. We're gonna stay together as a group. Okay, class, optical orbits up front. And remember, we keep our supraesophogeal ganglion to ourselves...that means you, Jimmy.

name: BOB
quote: Hey, you're doing pretty well for a first timer.

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, you can't hold onto them forever, can you?

name: BILL
quote: Yeah, I had a tough time when my oldest went out at the drop off.

name: MARLIN
quote: They just gotta grow up--the drop off?! They're going to the drop off?! Wh-what are you, insane?! Why don't we fry 'em up now and serve them with chips!?

name: MARLIN
quote: Don't tell me to be calm, pony boy!

name: BILL
quote: You know for a clownfish, he really isn't that funny.

name: MR. RAY
quote: [singing] Oh, let's name the species, the species, the species. Let's name the species that live in thesea.

name: MR. RAY
quote: [singing] There's porifera, coelenterata, hydrozoa, scyphozoa, anthozoa, ctenophora, bryozoas, three! Gastropoda, arthropoda, echinoderma, and some fish like you and me. Come on, sing with me. Oh...!

name: MR. RAY
quote: Just the girls this time. [singing] Oh, seaweed is cool. Seaweed is fun. It makes it's food with the rays of the sun...

name: MR. RAY
quote: Okay, the drop off. All right, kids, feel free to explore but stay close. [gasps] Stromalitic cyanobacteria! Gather. An entire ecosystem contained in one infinitesimal speck. There are as many protein pairs contained in this...

name: MR. RAY
quote: Come on, sing with me! [singing] There's porifera, coelentera, hydrozoa, scyphozoa, anthozoa, ctenophora, bryozoas, three!

name: PEARL
quote: Aw, you guys made me ink.

name: TAD
quote: I know what that is. Oh, oh! Sandy Plankton saw one. He called, he said it was called a...a butt.

name: PEARL
quote: Wow. That's a pretty big butt.

name: SHELDON
quote: Oh, look at me. I'm gonna go touch the butt. [sneezes] Whoa!

name: SHELDON
quote: Oh yeah? Let's see you get closer.

name: TAD
quote: Come on, Nemo. How far can you go?

name: NEMO
quote: Uh, my dad says it's not safe.

name: MARLIN
quote: You were about to swim into open water!

name: NEMO
quote: No, I wasn't go out--but dad!

name: MARLIN
quote: It was a good thing I was here. If I hadn't showed up, I don't know--

name: MARLIN
quote: This does not concern you, kids. And you're lucky I don't tell your parents you were out there. You know you can't swim well.

name: NEMO
quote: I can swim fine, dad, okay?

name: MARLIN
quote: No, it's not okay. You shouldn't be anywhere near here. Okay, I was right. You'll start school in a year or two.

name: NEMO
quote: No, dad! Just because you're scared of the ocean--

name: MARLIN
quote: Clearly, you're not ready. And you're not coming back until you are. You think you can do these things but you just can't, Nemo!

name: MR. RAY
quote: There's--nothing to see. Gather, uh, over there. Excuse me, is there anything I can do? I am a scientist, sir. Is there any problem?

name: MARLIN
quote: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to interrupt things. He isn't a good swimmer and it's a little too soon for him to be out here unsupervised.

name: MR. RAY
quote: Well, I can assure you, he's quite safe with me. MARLINLook, I'm sure he is. But you have a large class and he can get lost from sight if you're not looking. I'm not saying you're not looking--

name: FISH KID
quote: Oh my gosh! Nemo's swimming out to sea!

name: MARLIN
quote: Nemo! What do you think you're doing? You're gonna get stuck out there and I'll have to get you before another fish does! Get back here! I said get back here, now! Stop! You take one move, mister. Don't youdare! If you put one fin on that boat..are you listening to me? Don't touch the bo--Nemo!

name: MARLIN
quote: You paddle your little tail back here, Nemo. That's right. You are in big trouble, young man. Do you hear me? Big...big--

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh! Nemo! Unh! Nemo! Nemo, no! Nemo! Nemo! Nemo! No! No! Aah! Nemo! Nemo!

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh no. No, no. It's gone, it's gone. No, no, it can't be gone. No, no! Nemo! Nemo! Nemo! No! Nemo! Nemo! No! No, please, no! No, no!

name: MARLIN
quote: Has anybody seen a boat!? Please! A white boat! They took my son! My son! Help me, please!

name: DORY
quote: Ohh. Oh, oh. Sorry! I didn't see you. Sir, are you okay?

name: MARLIN
quote: No, no. They took him away. I have to find the boat.

name: DORY
quote: It passed by not too long ago.

name: DORY
quote: Oh, oh, oh! It-it went, um, this way! And it went this way! Follow me!

name: MARLIN
quote: Thank you! Thank you, thank you so much!

name: DORY
quote: I'm trying to swim here. What, ocean ain't big enough for you?

name: DORY
quote: You got a problem, buddy? Huh? Huh? Do 'ya? Do 'ya? Do 'ya? You want a piece of me? Yeah, oooh, I'm scared now. Whaat!?

name: MARLIN
quote: What? You're showing me which way the boat went!

name: DORY
quote: A boat? Hey, I've seen a boat. It passed by not too long ago. It went this way, it went this way. Follow me!

name: MARLIN
quote: Wait a minute, wait a minute! What is going on? You already told me which way the boat was going!

name: MARLIN
quote: If this is some kind of practical joke, it's not funny! And I know funny..I'm a clownfish!

name: DORY
quote: No, it's not. I know it's not. I'm so sorry. See, I suffer from short-term memory loss.

name: MARLIN
quote: Short-term memory loss..I don't believe this!

name: DORY
quote: No, it's true. I forget things almost instantly. It runs in my family..or at least I think it does. Hmmm..where are they? Can I help you?

name: MARLIN
quote: Something's wrong with you, really. You're wasting my time. I have to find my son. [gasps]

name: BRUCE
quote: Name's Bruce. It's all right, I understand. Why trust a shark, right? So, what's a couple of bites like you doing out so late, eh?

name: MARLIN
quote: Nothing. We're not doing anything. We're not even out.

name: BRUCE
quote: Great! Then how'd you morsels like to come to a little get-together I'm havin'?

name: BRUCE
quote: Yeah, yeah, that's right--a party! What do you say?

name: DORY
quote: Ooh, I love parties! Parties are fun!

name: MARLIN
quote: Parties are fun, and it's tempting but--

name: DORY
quote: Hey, look--balloons! It is a party!

name: BRUCE
quote: Ha ha ha! Mind your distance, though. Those balloons can be a bit dodgy. You wouldn't want one of them to pop.

name: CHUM
quote: We've already gone through all the snacks and I'm still starvin'!

name: ANCHOR
quote: We almost had a feeding frenzy.

name: CHUM
quote: Come on, let's get this over with.

name: BRUCE
quote: Right, then. The meeting has officially come to order. Let us all say the pledge..

name: BRUCE/ANCHOR/CHUM
quote: 'I am a nice shark, not a mindless eating machine. If I am to change this image, I must first change myself. Fish are friends, not food'.

name: CHUM
quote: Dolphins! Yeah, they think they're sooo cute! 'Hey, look at me. I'm a flippin' little dolphin! Let me flip for 'ya! Ain't I a somethin'!'

name: BRUCE
quote: Right, then. Today's meeting is step 5, 'BRING A FISH FRIEND'. Now do you all have your friends?

name: CHUM
quote: Oh, um, I seem to have misplaced my uh, friend.

name: BRUCE
quote: That's all right, Chum. I had a feeling this would be a difficult step, you can help yourself to one of my friends.

name: CHUM
quote: Oh, thanks, mate. A little chum for Chum, eh?

name: BRUCE
quote: I'll start the testimonies. Hello, my name is Bruce.

name: BRUCE
quote: It has been three weeks since my last fish, on my honor, or may I be chopped up and made into soup.

name: CHUM
quote: You're an inspiration to all of us.

name: BRUCE
quote: Yes, the little Sheila down the front.

name: DORY
quote: And, uh, well, I don't think I've ever eaten a fish.

name: DORY
quote: Whew! I'm glad I got that off my chest.

name: BRUCE
quote: All right, anyone else? Hello, how 'bout you, mate? What's your problem?

name: MARLIN
quote: Me? I don't have a problem.

name: MARLIN
quote: Okay. Uh, hello. My name is Marlin. I'm a clownfish--

name: BRUCE
quote: Go on, tell us a joke!

name: MARLIN
quote: Actually I do know one that's pretty good. There was this mollusk and he walks up to a sea cucumber. Normally, they don't talk, sea cucumbers, but in a joke, everyone talks. So the sea mollusk says to the cucumber...

name: CHUM
quote: Nemo! Ha ha ha! Nemo! I don't get it.

name: BRUCE
quote: For a clownfish, he's not that funny.

name: MARLIN
quote: No, no, no, no. He's my son. He was taken by these divers.

name: BRUCE
quote: Now there is a father looking for his little boy.

name: MARLIN
quote: Ugh! What do these markings mean?

name: DORY
quote: Well then we gotta find a fish who can read this. Hey, look. Sharks!

name: DORY
quote: That's mine! Give it to me! Gimme! Oww!

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh, I'm sorry. Are you okay?

name: DORY
quote: You really clocked me there. Am I bleeding?

name: BRUCE
quote: Dory, are you oka--oohh. Oohh, that's good.

name: CHUM
quote: Remember, Bruce, fish are friends, not food!

name: MARLIN
quote: There's no way out! There's got to be a way to escape!

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory, help me find a way out!

name: DORY
quote: Sorry, you'll have to come back later. We're trying to escape.

name: MARLIN
quote: There's gotta be a way out!

name: DORY
quote: Look, here's something! 'ESSS-CA-PE'! I wonder what that means. It's funny, it's spelled just like the word 'escape'.

name: DORY
quote: I can read? That's right, I can read!

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, then here. Read this now!

name: ANCHOR
quote: He really doesn't mean it, y'know! He never even knew his father!

name: MARLIN
quote: I need to get that mask!

name: MARLIN
quote: No, no, no, no, no, no!

name: DENTIST
quote: Prep for his anterior crown, would you, please? And I'm going to need a few cotton rolls.

name: DENTIST
quote: Heh heh heh! Beauty, isn't he? I found that guy struggling for life out on the reef and I saved him. So, has that novocaine kicked in yet?

name: PATIENT
quote: I think so. We're ready to roll.

name: BLOAT
quote: Heh heh! Slow down, little fella. There's nothing to worry about.

name: NEMO
quote: I wanna go home. Do you know where my dad is?

name: PEACH
quote: Honey, your dad's probably back at the pet store.

name: BLOAT
quote: Yeah, you know, like I'm from Bob's Fish Mart.

name: GURGLE
quote: Ah, the ocean. The ocean! Aaah! He hasn't been decontaminated yet! Jacques!

name: JACQUES
quote: Ooh, la mer. Bon. Voila. He is clean.

name: BUBBLES
quote: Wow. The big blue. What's it like?

name: DEB
quote: Kid, if there's anything you need, just ask your auntie Deb, that's me. Or if I'm not around, you can always talk to my sister Flo. Hi,how are you? Don't listen to anything my sister says, she's nuts! Ha ha ha ha!

name: PEACH
quote: I said we got a live one.

name: BLOAT
quote: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!

name: PEACH
quote: Root canal, and by the looks of those x-rays it's not gonna be pretty.

name: GURGLE
quote: What did he use to open?

name: PEACH
quote: Gator-Glidden drill. He seems to be favoring that one lately.

name: PEACH
quote: Now he's doing the Schilder technique.

name: BLOAT
quote: Oooh, he's using a Hedstrom file.

name: GURGLE
quote: That's not a Hedstrom file. That's a K-Flex.

name: BLOAT
quote: It's got a teardrop cross-section. Clearly a Hedstrom.

name: BLOAT
quote: Hedstro--! [inflates] There I go. A little help over here.

name: DENTIST
quote: All right, go ahead and rinse.

name: GURGLE
quote: Ugh! The human mouth is a disgusting place.

name: NIGEL
quote: What did I miss? Am I late?

name: PEACH
quote: Root canal and it's a doozy.

name: NIGEL
quote: Root canal, eh? What did he use to open?

name: NIGEL
quote: He seems to be favoring that one. Hope he doesn't get surplus sealer at the portal terminus... hello.

name: GURGLE
quote: The dentist took him off the reef.

name: NIGEL
quote: An outie. From my neck of the woods, eh? Sorry if I ever took a snap at you. Fish gotta swim, birds gotta eat. [gasps]

name: DENTIST
quote: Hey! No, no,   no, no! They're not your fish. They're my fish. Come on, go! Go on, shoo! Oh, the picture   broke. This here's Darla. She's my niece. She's going to be eight next week. Hey, little   fella. Say hello to your new mummy. She'll be here Friday to pick you up. You're her present.   Shh, shh, shh! It's our little secret. Well, Mr. Tucker, while that sets up I'm going to   see a man about a wallaby.

name: GURGLE
quote: She wouldn't stop shaking the bag.

name: DEB
quote: He was her present last year.

name: BLOAT
quote: Hitched a ride on the porcelain express.

name: NEMO
quote: I can't go with that girl! I have to get back to my dad! Aaah! Daddy! Help me!

name: GILL
quote: Nobody touch him! Nobody touch him.

name: GILL
quote: No. You got yourself in there, you can get yourself out.

name: GILL
quote: I just wanna see him do it, okay? Calm down. Alternate wiggling your fins and your tail.

name: NEMO
quote: I can't. I have a bad fin.

name: GILL
quote: Just think about what you need to do.

name: PEACH
quote: Wow. From the ocean. Just like you, Gill.

name: PEACH
quote: I've seen that look before. What are you thinking about?

name: GILL
quote: I'm thinking, tonight, we give the kid a proper reception.

name: BLOAT
quote: So kid, you got a name or what?

name: DORY
quote: Are you gonna eat that? Careful with that hammer...

name: MARLIN
quote: Huh? No, no! What does it say? Dory!

name: MARLIN
quote: Wake up! Get up! Come on! Come on!

name: DORY
quote: Look out! Sharks eat fish! Aaaaaah!

name: MARLIN
quote: [gasps] The mask! Where's the mask? No! No, not the mask! Get it! Get the mask! Get the mask! Get it!

name: DORY
quote: [singing] Hoo doot doo doot doot doo doot. Whoo-hoo! La la la la la la. Just keeps going on, doesn't it? Echo! Echo! Hey, what are you doing?

name: MARLIN
quote: It's gone. I've lost the mask.

name: MARLIN
quote: You dropped it! That was my only chance of finding my son, now it's gone.

name: DORY
quote: Hey, Mr. Grumpy Gills. When life gets you down, you know what you gotta do?

name: MARLIN
quote: I don't wanna know what you gotta do when life gets you down.

name: DORY
quote: [singing] Just keep swimming. Just keep swimming, swimming, swimming. What do we do? We swim, swim.

name: DORY
quote: [singing] Ho ho ho ho ho ho! I love to swim! When you want to swim..

name: MARLIN
quote: See, I'm going to get stuck now with that song now it's in my head!

name: MARLIN
quote: Who could it be? It's me!

name: MARLIN
quote: Yeah, yeah. I'm your conscience. We haven't spoken for a while. How are you?

name: MARLIN
quote: Yeah? Good. Now, Dory. I want you to tell me..do you see anything?

name: DORY
quote: Yeah. Over there. Hey, conscience. Am I dead?

name: MARLIN
quote: No, I see it too. What is it?

name: MARLIN
quote: I'm feeling...happy. Which is a big deal for me.

name: DORY
quote: I want to touch it. Oh!

name: MARLIN
quote: Hey, come back. Come on back here.

name: DORY
quote: [singing] I'm gonna get you. I'm gonna get you. I'm gonna swim with you.

name: MARLIN
quote: I'm gonna get you. I'm gonna be your best friend...good feeling's gone.

name: MARLIN
quote: I can't see! I don't know where I'm going!

name: DORY
quote: Okay, I can't see a thing.

name: DORY
quote: I'm sorry, but if you could just bring it a little closer, I kind of need the light. That's great, keep it right there.

name: DORY
quote: Okay, okay. Mr. Bossy. Uh, 'P'. Okay, 'P'. 'Shh-eer...Sher--P. Sher--P. Shirley? P.--'. Oh! The first line's 'P. Sherman'!

name: MARLIN
quote: P. Sherman doesn't make any sense!

name: MARLIN
quote: Don't eat me! Don't eat me! Aaaah!

name: MARLIN
quote: That's great! Speed read! Take a guess! No pressure! No problem! There's a lot of pressure! Pressure! Take a guess now with pressure!

name: MARLIN
quote: I'm dead, I'm dead, I'm dead, I'm dead, I'm dead, I died, I'm dead.

name: MARLIN
quote: Whoo-hoo! [singing] We did it, we did it! Oh yeah, yeah, yeah! No eating here tonight, whoo!

name: DORY
quote: [singing] No, no, no eating here tonight. You on a diet--

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory! What did the mask say?

name: DORY
quote: 'P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney'. [gasps] I remember what it said! I usually forget things, but I remembered it this time!

name: MARLIN
quote: Whoa, whoa, wait! Where is that?

name: DORY
quote: I don't know. But who cares? I remembered!

name: DORY
quote: P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. I remembered it again!

name: BLOAT/BUBBLES/GURGLE
quote: [chanting] Ha! Ho! Hwa! Hwee! Ha! Ho! Ho! Ho! Ha! Ho! Hwa! Hwee! Ha! Ho! Ho! Ho! Ha! Ho! Hwa! Hwee! Ha! Ho! Ho! Ho! Hahoo! Wahoo! Yahoo! Ho! Ha! Ho! Wahee! Ha! Ho! Ho! Ho! Hoo!

name: BLOAT
quote: Nemo! Newcomer of orange and white, you have been called forth to the summit of Mount Wannahockaloogie to join with us in the fraternal bonds of tankhood.

name: PEACH
quote: We want you in our club, kid.

name: BLOAT
quote: If you are able to swim through..THE RING OF FIRE! [whispers to Jacques] Turn on the Ring of Fire! The Ring of Fire, you said you could do it--THE RING OF FIRE!

name: PEACH
quote: Isn't there another way? He's just a boy!

name: GILL
quote: From this moment on, you will now be known as Sharkbait.

name: GILL
quote: Okay, Sharkbait's one of us now, agreed?

name: GILL
quote: We can't send him off to his death. Darla's coming in 5 days, so what are we gonna do? I'll tell you what we're gonna do: we're gonna get him outta here. We're gonna help him escape.

name: GURGLE
quote: Gill, please, not another one of your escape plans.

name: DEB
quote: Sorry, but they, they just, they never work.

name: BLOAT
quote: Yeah. Why should this be any different?

name: GILL
quote: You're the only one who can get in and out of that thing. What we need you to do is take a pebble inside and jam the gears. You do that and this tank's gonna get filthier and filthier by the minute. Pretty soon, the dentist'll have to clean the tank himself. And when he does, he'll take us out of the tank, put us in the individual baggies, then we roll ourselves down the counter, out of the window, off the awning, into the bushes, across the street and into the harbor! It's foolproof! Who's with me?

name: GURGLE
quote: No offense, kid, but, um..you're not the best swimmer.

name: GILL
quote: He's fine, he can do this. So Sharkbait, what do you think?

name: DORY
quote: I'm going to P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Where are you going? I'm going to P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. If you're askin' where I'm goin'. I'll tell you that's where I'm going. It's P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Where? I'm sorry, I didn't hear you. P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way...

name: MARLIN
quote: Excuse me. Ex-excuse me, um, hi. Do you know how to get to--hello? W-w-w-wait! Can you tell me--hey! Hold it! Wait a minute! I'm trying to talk to you. Okay, fellas, come back here. Please, one quick question. I need to aaaaand they're gone again. [sighs]

name: DORY
quote: P. Sherman 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney. Why do I have to tell you over and over again? I'll tell you again. I don't get tired of it--

name: MARLIN
quote: Y'know, I just, I-I think it's best if I just, if I just, carry on from here by..by myself.

name: MARLIN
quote: Without, without..well, I mean, not without you. I mean, it's just that I don't want you... with me.

name: MARLIN
quote: I don't wanna hurt your feelings..

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, I mean not..yes, yeah. It's just that you know I-I just can't afford anymore delays and you're one of those fish that cause delays. And sometimes it's a good thing. There's a whole group of fish. They're..'delay fish'.

name: DORY
quote: You mean..[whimper]you mean you don't..like me? [sobs]

name: MARLIN
quote: No, of course I like you. It's because I like you I don't wanna be with you. It's a complicated emotion. Oh, don't cry. I like you.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Hey, you! Lady, is this guy botherin' you?

name: DORY
quote: Um, I don't remember. Were you?

name: MARLIN
quote: No, no, no, no, no. We're just, we're..hey, do you guys know how I can get to--

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Look, pal. We're talkin' to the lady, not you. Hey-hey, you like impressions?

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Okay. Just like in rehearsals, gentlemen. So, what are we? Take a guess.

name: DORY
quote: Oh, oh, I've seen one of those.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: I'm a fish with a nose like a sword.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Hey, clown boy! Let the lady guess. Where's the butter?

name: DORY
quote: Oh-oh-oh! It's on the tip of my tongue.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Lots of legs, lives in the ocean.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Close enough. [singing] Oh, it's a whale of a tale, I'll tell you lad, a whale of a tale.

name: MARLIN
quote: Will somebody please give me directions?

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: [impersonating Marlin] Will somebody please give me directions?

name: DORY
quote: Oh dear. Hey, hey come back! Hey, what's the matter?

name: MARLIN
quote: What's the matter? While they're doing their silly little impressions, I am miles from home, with a fish that can't even remember her own name.

name: MARLIN
quote: Yeah. Meanwhile my son is out there.

name: MARLIN
quote: But it doesn't matter, 'cause no fish in this entire ocean is gonna help me.

name: DORY
quote: Well, I'm helping you. Wait right here. Hey, guys.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: What, is he bothering you again?

name: DORY
quote: No, no, he's a good guy. Go easy on him, he's lost his son, Fabio. Any of you heard of P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney?

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Sydney? Oh sure. Why, Ted here's got relatives in Sydney. Don't you, Ted?

name: DORY
quote: You wouldn't know how to get there, would you?

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: What you wanna do is follow the EAC, that's the East Australian Current. Big current, can't miss it, it's in..that direction. And then you gotta follow that for about, I don't know, what do you guys think? About three leagues? And that little baby's gonna put you right past Sydney.

name: MARLIN
quote: Great! That's great! Dory, you did it!

name: DORY
quote: Oh, please. I'm just your little helper. Helping along, that's me.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Don't mention it. And, uh, loosen up. Okay, buddy?

name: DORY
quote: Oh, you guys. You really nailed him. Bye.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: Oh, hey ma'am, one more thing.

name: MOONFISH LEADER
quote: When you come to this trench, swim through it, not over it.

name: DORY
quote: Trench, through it, not over it. I'll remember. Hey, hey! Hey! Hey! Hey, wait up, partner. Hold on. Wait! Wait-wait! I got, I gotta tell you something..whoa. Nice trench. Hello! Okay, let's go.

name: MARLIN
quote: Bad trench, bad trench. Come on, we're gonna swim over this thing.

name: DORY
quote: Whoa, whoa, partner. Little red flag goin' up. Somethin's telling me we should swim through it, not over it.

name: MARLIN
quote: Are you even looking at this thing? It's got death written all over it.

name: DORY
quote: I'm sorry, but I really, really, really think we should swim through.

name: MARLIN
quote: And I'm really, really done talking about this. Over we go.

name: DORY
quote: Come on, trust me on this.

name: DORY
quote: Yes, trust. It's what friends do.

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh, it just swam over the trench. Come on, we'll follow it.

name: DORY
quote: Boy, sure is clear up here.

name: MARLIN
quote: Exactly. And look at that, there's the current. We should be there in no time.

name: MARLIN
quote: You wanted to go through the trench.

name: DORY
quote: I shall call him Squishy and he shall be mine and he shall be my Squishy. Come here, Squishy. Come here, little Squishy. [Baby talk]---oww!

name: MARLIN
quote: Shoo! Shoo, shoo! Get away! Come here, let me see.

name: DORY
quote: Don't touch it! Don't touch it!

name: MARLIN
quote: I'm not gonna touch it. I just wanna look.

name: DORY
quote: Heeey, how come it didn't sting you?

name: MARLIN
quote: ..hold still. I live in this anemone and I'm, I'm, I'm used to these kind of stings. Come here.

name: MARLIN
quote: It doesn't look bad, you're gonna be fine. But now we know, don't we?

name: MARLIN
quote: That we don't wanna touch these again. Let's be thankful this time it was just a little one.[gasps]

name: MARLIN
quote: Don't move! This is bad, Dory.

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory! Don't bounce on the tops! They will..not sting you. The tops don't sting you, that's it!

name: DORY
quote: Ooh! Two in a row, beat that.

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory! All right, listen to me. I have an idea, a game.

name: DORY
quote: Aah! I love games! Pick me!

name: MARLIN
quote: All right, here's the game. Um, whoever can hop the fastest out of these jellyfish, wins.

name: MARLIN
quote: You can't touch the tentacles, only the tops.

name: DORY
quote: Something about tentacles, got it. On your mark, get set, go!

name: MARLIN
quote: W-wait! Wait! Not something about them, it's all about them! Wait!

name: DORY
quote: Gotta go faster if you wanna win!

name: MARLIN
quote: So, we're cheating death now. That's what we're doin'. We're havin' fun at the same time. I can do this, just be careful.

name: DORY
quote: Yeah, careful I don't make you cry when I win!

name: DORY
quote: Ha ha ha ha! Whooo! Give it up, old man. You can't fight evolution, I was built for speed.

name: MARLIN
quote: The question is, Dory, are you hungry?

name: MARLIN
quote: Yeah, 'cause you're about to eat my bubbles! Duck to the left! Right there! The clownfish is the winner! Woohoo! We did it! We're gonna...Dory? Oh no. Dory! Dory! Dory! [gasps] Dory! Uggghhh!

name: MARLIN
quote: No, you're doing fine! You're, you're actually winning! But you gotta stay awake. Uh, where does P. Sherman live?

name: MARLIN
quote: That's it! Oww! Ow! Stay awake! Stay awake! Ow! Stay awake! Stay--awake!

name: GILL
quote: You miss your dad, don't you, Sharkbait?

name: GILL
quote: Well, you're lucky to have someone out there who's lookin' for you.

name: NEMO
quote: He's not looking for me. He's scared of the ocean.

name: PEACH
quote: He's had at least four cups of coffee, it's gotta be soon.

name: GILL
quote: My first escape, landed on dental tools. I was aimin' for the toilet.

name: GILL
quote: All drains lead to the ocean, kid.

name: NEMO
quote: Wow. How many times have you tried to get out?

name: GILL
quote: Aah, I've lost count. Fish aren't meant to be in a box, kid. It does things to 'ya.

name: PEACH
quote: Potty break! Potty break! He just grabbed the Reader's Digest! We have 4.2 minutes.

name: GILL
quote: Okay, you gotta be quick. Once you get in, you swim down to the bottom of the chamber and I'll talk you through the rest.

name: GILL
quote: Go on, it'll be a piece of kelp.

name: GILL
quote: Nicely done! Can you hear me?

name: GILL
quote: Here comes the pebble. Now, do you see a small opening?

name: GILL
quote: Okay, inside it you'll see a rotating fan. Very carefully, wedge that pebble into the fan to stop it turning.

name: PEACH
quote: Gill, this isn't a good idea.

name: GILL
quote: That's it, Sharkbait. Nice and steady.

name: NEMO
quote: I got it! I got it!

name: GILL
quote: That's great, kid! Now, swim up the tube and out.

name: GILL
quote: Get 'im outta there! Get 'im outta there!

name: GURGLE
quote: What do we do!? What do we do!?

name: GILL
quote: Stay calm, kid! Just don't panic!

name: PEACH
quote: Gill, don't make him go back in there.

name: CRUSH
quote: Oh, saw the whole thing, dude. First you were like, 'whoa'! And then we were all like, 'whoa'! And then you were like, 'whoa'.

name: CRUSH
quote: You, mini-man. Takin' on the jellies. You got serious thrill issues, dude.

name: CRUSH
quote: Oh, man. No hurlin' on the shell, dude, okay, just waxed it.

name: CRUSH
quote: Whoa, dude. Mr. Turtle is my father. Name's Crush.

name: MARLIN
quote: Crush? Really? Okay Crush, listen I need to get to the East Australian Current. EAC?

name: CRUSH
quote: Ha ha ha, dude, ha ha, you're ridin' it, dude! Check it out!

name: CRUSH
quote: So, what brings you on this fine day to the EAC?

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, Dory and I need to get to Sydney. [gasps] Dory! Dory! Is she all right!?

name: CRUSH
quote: Oh. Oh, Little Blue. She is sub-level, dude.

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh, Dory. I-I-I'm so sorry. This is all my fault, it's my fault...

name: DORY
quote: ..29, 30! Ready or not, here I come! There you are! Catch me if you can! Ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!

name: CRUSH
quote: Whoa. Kill the motor, dude. Let us see what Squirt does flying solo.

name: SQUIRT
quote: Whoa! Whoa! That was so cool! Hey dad, did you see that? Did you see me? Did you see what I did?

name: CRUSH
quote: You so totally rock, Squirt! So give me some fin..noggin..

name: CRUSH
quote: Oh, intro. Jellyman, Offspring. Offspring, Jellyman.

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, apparently, I must've done something you all like. Heh, uh, dudes.

name: CRUSH
quote: Curl away, my son. Aw, it's awesome, Jellyman. Little dudes are just eggs, leave 'em on the beach to hatch, then coo-coo-ca-choo, they find their way back to the big 'ol blue.

name: MARLIN
quote: But-but-but dude, how do you know when they're ready?

name: CRUSH
quote: Well, you never really know. But when they'll know, you'll know, you know? Ha.

name: SQUIRT
quote: I know that dude. It's the Jellyman.

name: DORY
quote: Well, go on, jump on him.

name: MARLIN
quote: Hold on, I need to breath--

name: TURTLE KID 4
quote: Did you really cross the jellyfish forest?

name: DORY
quote: Sorry. I was a little vague on the details.

name: MARLIN
quote: Well, you see my son was taken. My son was taken away from me.

name: MARLIN
quote: No, no, no, kids. I don't wanna talk about it.

name: MARLIN
quote: [sighs] Well, okay. I live on this reef, a long long way from here.

name: DORY
quote: Oh, boy. This is gonna be good, I can tell.

name: MARLIN
quote: And my son,   Nemo, see he was mad at me. And maybe he wouldn't have done it if I hadn't been so tough on   him, I don't know. Anyway, he swam out in the open water to this boat and when he was out   there, these divers appeared and I tried to stop them but the boat was too fast. So we swam   out in the ocean to follow them...

name: TURTLE KID
quote: They couldn't stop them. And then Nemo's dad, he swims out to the ocean and they bump into..

name: SMALL FISH
quote: ..three ferocious sharks! He scares away the sharks by blowin' them up!

name: LOBSTER
quote: ..feet straight down into the dark. It's like wicked dark down there, you can see a thing. How's it goin', Bob? And the only thing that they can see down there..

name: SWORDFISH
quote: ..is the light from this big horrible creature with razor sharp teeth. Nice parry, old man. And then he has to blast his way...

name: DOLPHIN
quote: So, these two little fish have been..searching the ocean for days. On the East Australian Current.

name: FEMALE BIRD
quote: Which means that he may be on his way here right now. That should put them in Sydney..

name: MALE BIRD 1
quote: ..Harbor in a matter of days. I mean, it sounds like this guy's gonna stop at..

name: MALE BIRD 2
quote: ..nothing until he finds his son. I sure hope he makes it.

name: MALE BIRD 3
quote: That's one dedicated father if you ask me.

name: GULLS
quote: Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine!

name: NIGEL
quote: Oh, would you just shut up! You're rats with wings!

name: PELICAN
quote: ..bloke's been lookin' for his boy Nemo.

name: PELICAN
quote: He was taken off the reef by divers and this..

name: NIGEL
quote: Hey, hey, hey! Say that again! You said something about Nemo. What was it?

name: PELICAN
quote: Last I heard, he's headin' towards the harbor.

name: GURGLE
quote: I don't know, but whatever you do, don't mention D-A-R..

name: NEMO
quote: It's okay, I know who you're talking about.

name: NEMO
quote: I'm sorry I couldn't stop the--

name: GILL
quote: No, I'm the one who should be sorry. I was so ready to get out, so ready to taste that ocean. I was willing to put you in harm's way to get there. Nothing should be worth that. I'm sorry I couldn't get you back to your father, kid.

name: NIGEL
quote: All right! Hey, hey, hey, hey--!

name: DENTIST
quote: Well, uh, that's one way to pull a tooth. He he he he he! Huh, darn kids. Well, good thing I pulled the right one, eh, prime minister? He he he he!

name: PEACH
quote: Oh, Nigel. You just missed an extraction.

name: NIGEL
quote: Ooh! Has he loosened the periodontal ligament yet--oh, what I'm talkin' about!? Nemo! Where's Nemo? I gotta speak with him.

name: NIGEL
quote: Your dad's been fighting the entire ocean looking for you.

name: NIGEL
quote: Oh yeah. He's travelled hundreds of miles. He's been battling sharks and jellyfish and all sorts of--

name: NIGEL
quote: Are you sure? What was his name? Some sort of sportfish or something: tuna, uh, trout..

name: NIGEL
quote: That's it! Marlin! The little clownfish from the reef.

name: NEMO
quote: It's my dad! He took on a shark!

name: NIGEL
quote: I heard he took on three.

name: BLOAT
quote: That's gotta be forty eight hundred teeth!

name: NIGEL
quote: You see, kid, after you were taken by diver Dan over there, your dad followed the boat you were on like a maniac.

name: NIGEL
quote: He's swimming and   he's swimming and he's giving it all he's got and then three gigantic sharks capture him   and he blows them up! And then dives thousands of feet and gets chased by a monster with   huge teeth! He ties this demon to a rock and what does he get for a reward? He gets to   battle an entire jellyfish forest! And now he's riding with a bunch of sea turtles on   the East Australian Current and the word is he's headed this way right now, to Sydney!

name: GILL
quote: He was lookin' for you after all, Sharkbait.

name: GURGLE
quote: You've got your whole life ahead of you!

name: GURGLE
quote: Come on, kid! Grab the end!

name: GILL
quote: Can you hear me, Sharkbait!? Nemo! Can you hear me!?

name: GILL
quote: All right, gang. We have less than 48 hours before Darla gets here. This tank'll get plenty dirty in that time but we have to help it along any way we can. Jacques!

name: GILL
quote: Everybody else, be as gross as possible. Think dirty thoughts. We're gonna make this tank so filthy, the dentist'll have to clean it.

name: CRUSH
quote: All right, we're here, dudes! Get ready! Your exit's comin' up, man!

name: DORY
quote: Right there! I see it! I see it!

name: MARLIN
quote: You mean the swirling vortex of terror!?

name: CRUSH
quote: Okay, first: find your exit buddy!

name: CRUSH
quote: Do you have your exit buddy?

name: CRUSH
quote: Okay, Squirt here will now give you a rundown of proper exiting technique!

name: SQUIRT
quote: Good afternoon, we're gonna have a great jump today! Okay, crank a hard cutback as you hit the wall! There's a screaming bottom turn, so watch out! Remember: rip it, roll it and punch it!

name: MARLIN
quote: It's like he's trying to speak to me, I know it! You know, you're really cute! But I don't know what you're saying! Say the first thing again!

name: CRUSH
quote: Okay, Jellyman! Go, go, go, go, go, go!

name: MARLIN/DORY
quote: Aaaaaaaaaah!!! Weeeeeeeeeeee!!! Whoooooooooooaaaaa!!! Aaaaaaaaaaah!!! Woohoooo!!! Whoooooaaa!!!

name: MARLIN
quote: Ha ha ha ha! That was..fun! Ha ha! I actually enjoyed that!

name: CRUSH
quote: Ha ha! Most excellent! Now, turn your fishy tails 'round and swim straight on through to Sydney! No worries, man!

name: MARLIN
quote: No worries! Thank you, dude Crush!

name: CRUSH
quote: You tell your little dude I said 'hi', okay?

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh, Nemo would've loved this. Hey, ooh! Hey, Crush! Crush, I forgot! How old are you?

name: CRUSH
quote: Hundred and fifty, dude! And still young! Rock on!

name: MARLIN
quote: Hundred and fifty! Hundred and fifty, I gotta remember that.

name: MARLIN
quote: Yup. We're gonna just swim straight.

name: DORY
quote: [singing] Just keep swimming, just keep swimming.

name: MARLIN
quote: Boy, this is taking a while.

name: DORY
quote: Hey, how about we play a game?

name: DORY
quote: Uh, okay. I'm thinking of something, uh, orange. And it's small..

name: MARLIN
quote: Me. And the next one's just a guess: me.

name: MARLIN
quote: W-w-wait, I have definitely seen this floating speck before. That means we've passed it before and that means we're going in circles and that means we're not going straight!

name: MARLIN
quote: We gotta get to the surface, come on! Let's figure it out up there. Let's go! Follow me! Wha--?

name: DORY
quote: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hey! Relax. Take a deep breath. Now, let's ask somebody for directions.

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh, fine. Who do you wanna ask, the speck? There's nobody here!

name: DORY
quote: Well, there has to be someone. It's the ocean, silly, we're not the only two in here. Let's see...okay, no one there. Uhh, nope. Nada. [gasps] There's somebody. Hey! Excuse--

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory! Dory! Dory! Okay, now it's my turn. I'm thinking of something dark and mysterious. It's a fish we don't know. And if we ask it directions, it could ingest us and spit out our bones!

name: DORY
quote: What is it with men and asking for directions?

name: MARLIN
quote: Look, I don't wanna play the gender card right now. You wanna play a card? Let's play the 'Let's Not Die' card.

name: DORY
quote: You wanna get outta here, don't you?

name: DORY
quote: Well then, how are we gonna do that unless we give it a shot and hope for the best? Hmmm? Hmmmm!? Come on, trust me on this.

name: DORY
quote: Excuse me! Woohoo! Little fella? Hello. Don't be rude, say 'hi'.

name: DORY
quote: Sydney. Yes. And it's really, really important that we get there as fast as we can. So can you help us out? Come on, little fella. Come on.

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory, I'm a little fella. I don't think that's a little fella.

name: DORY
quote: Oh. Oh, oh, big fella. Big fe--whale. Okay. Maybe he only speaks whale.

name: MARLIN
quote: Are you sure you speak whale?

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory! Heaven knows what you're saying! See, he's swimming away.

name: MARLIN
quote: He's not coming back. You offended him.

name: DORY
quote: Maybe a different dialect. MOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! MOOOOOAAAAAAAAAA..!

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory. Dory, this is not whale. You're speaking like..upset stomach.

name: DORY
quote: Too much orca. Didn't it sound a little orca-ish?

name: MARLIN
quote: It doesn't sound orca! It sounds like nothing I've ever heard!

name: MARLIN
quote: It's just as well, he might be hungry.

name: DORY
quote: Don't worry. Whales don't eat clownfish, they eat krill.

name: GILL
quote: Look at that. Would you look at that? Filthy. Absolutely filthy. And it's all thanks to you, kid. You made it possible. Jacques, I said no cleaning!

name: DEB
quote: Flo! Flo! Has anybody seen Flo? Flo!

name: PEACH
quote: Nine o' clock and cue dentist.

name: PEACH
quote: Okay. Okay, here we go. Here we go, okay.

name: PEACH
quote: Okay. Walks to the counter, drops the keys..

name: GURGLE
quote: Eww! Don't you people realize we are swimming in our own--

name: DENTIST
quote: Crikey, what a state. Oh. Barbara, what's my earliest appointment tomorrow?

name: DENTIST
quote: Leave it open, would you? I gotta clean the fish tank before Darla gets here.

name: GILL
quote: He he! Did you hear that, Sharkbait?

name: NEMO
quote: Yay! He's gonna clean the tank! He's gonna clean the tank! We're gonna be clean!

name: GILL
quote: Are you ready to see your dad, kid?

name: GILL
quote: Of course you are. Y'know, I wouldn't be surprised if he's out there in the harbor waitin' for you right now.

name: DORY
quote: Here comes a big one--whooooooo! Come on, you gotta try this!

name: MARLIN
quote: We're in a whale! Don't you get it!?

name: MARLIN
quote: A whale! 'Cause you had to ask for help! And now we're stuck here!

name: DORY
quote: Wow. A whale. You know I speak whale.

name: MARLIN
quote: No, you're insane! You can't speak whale! I have to get out! I have to find my son! I have to tell him how old sea turtles are! [sobs]

name: DORY
quote: There, there. It's all right. It'll be okay.

name: MARLIN
quote: No. I promised him I'd never let anything happen to him.

name: DORY
quote: Huh. That's a funny thing to promise.

name: DORY
quote: Well, you can't never let anything happen to him. Then nothing would ever happen to him. Not much fun for little Harpo.

name: DORY
quote: I don't know. I'll ask him. MMMWWHAAAAAAAAA! HUUUWHAAAAAAAAA..

name: DORY
quote: I think he says we've stopped.

name: MARLIN
quote: Of course, we've stopped. Just stop trying to speak whale, you're gonna make things worse. [gasps] What is that noise? Oh no. Look what you did. The water's going down! It's-it's-it's going down!

name: DORY
quote: Okay, that one was a little tougher. He either said we should go to the back of the throat or he wants a root beer float.

name: MARLIN
quote: Of course he wants us to go there! That's eating us! How do I taste, Moby!? Huh!? Do I taste good!? You tell him I'm not interested in being lunch!

name: MARLIN
quote: No! No more whale! You can't speak whale!

name: MARLIN
quote: No, you can't! You think you could do these things but you can't, Nemo!

name: DORY
quote: He says it's time to let go! Everything's gonna be all right!

name: MARLIN
quote: How do you know!? How do you know something bad isn't gonna happen!?

name: DORY
quote: Look! Sy-d-ney..Sydney! Uh, Sydney! Sydney again!

name: MARLIN
quote: You were right, Dory! We made it! We're gonna find my son!

name: DORY
quote: Wow. I wish I could speak whale.

name: MARLIN
quote: Okay. All we gotta do is find the boat that took him.

name: MARLIN
quote: Come on, Dory. We can do this!

name: PEACH
quote: [yawn] Morning. [gasps] It's morning, everyone! Today's the day! The sun is shining, the tank is clean and we are getting out of--[gasps]--the tank is clean. The tank is clean!

name: GILL
quote: Boss must've installed it last night while we were sleepin'.

name: PEACH
quote: 'The AquaScum 2003 is an all-purpose, self-cleaning maintenance free salt water purifier that is guaranteed to even extend the life of your aquarium fish'.

name: PEACH
quote: 'The AquaScum is programmed to scan your tank environment every 5 minutes'?

name: BLOAT
quote: That's it for the escape plan. It's ruined!

name: NEMO
quote: Then what're we gonna do about--

name: GURGLE
quote: My nerves can't take much more of this.

name: BLOAT
quote: What're we gonna do when that little brat gets here?

name: GILL
quote: Swim down! Come on, kid! Swim down! Come on!

name: DENTIST
quote: Whoops. That would've been a nasty fall.

name: NEMO
quote: Gill! Don't let me go belly up!

name: NEMO
quote: Don't let me go belly up!

name: GILL
quote: You won't go belly up, I promise. You're gonna be okay.

name: DORY
quote: All right, do any of these boats look familiar to you?

name: MARLIN
quote: No, but the boat has to be here somewhere! Come on, Dory, we're gonna find it.

name: DORY
quote: I'm totally excited. [yawn] Are you excited? [yawn]

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory, wake up, wake up. Come on.

name: MARLIN
quote: That's not a duck. It's a--pelican! Whooooaaaaah!

name: MARLIN
quote: No! I didn't come this far to be breakfast!

name: PELICAN
quote: Hey, hey, Nigel. Heh, would you look at that?

name: PELICAN
quote: Sun's barely up and already Gerald's had more than he can handle.

name: NIGEL
quote: Yeah. Reckon somebody oughta help the poor guy.

name: NIGEL
quote: Well, don't everybody fly off at once.

name: NIGEL
quote: All right, Gerald, what is it? Fish got your tongue?

name: MARLIN
quote: I gotta find my son Nemo!

name: NIGEL
quote: [gasps] Nemo? Hey, hey, hey! He's that fish! Y'know the one we were talking about! The one that's been fighting the whole ocean! Hey, I know where your son i--huh? Hey, wait! Come back! Stop!

name: NIGEL
quote: Okay, don't make any sudden moves. Hop inside my mouth if you want to live.

name: MARLIN
quote: Hop in your mouth, huh? And how does that make me live?

name: NIGEL
quote: Because I can take you to your son.

name: NIGEL
quote: No. I know your son. He's orange, he's got a gimpy fin on one side..

name: GULLS
quote: Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine!

name: GULLS
quote: Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine!

name: GULLS
quote: Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine!

name: GULLS
quote: Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine! Mine!

name: BUBBLES
quote: Aaaah! Too loud! Too loud for me!

name: PEACH
quote: Find a happy place, find a happy place, find a happy place!

name: BARBARA
quote: Darla, you're uncle will see you now.

name: DENTIST
quote: All right, let's see those pearly whites.

name: DARLA
quote: RAAAH! I'm a piranha. They're in the Amazon.

name: DENTIST
quote: And a piranha's a fish, just like your present.

name: DARLA
quote: [giggling] I get a fishy! Fishy, fishy, fishy!

name: DENTIST
quote: He he he! Must've left your present in the car, sweetie. Ha ha ha ha ha!

name: BLOAT
quote: What's happening? Why is he playing dead?

name: GILL
quote: He's gonna get flushed down the toilet! He's gonna get outta here!

name: GILL
quote: Oh no, not the trash can!

name: NIGEL
quote: Hey! Hey! I found his dad!

name: MARLIN
quote: What's a dentist!? What is that!? [gasps] Nigel, get in there!

name: DENTIST
quote: What the--!? Darla, sweetie! Look out!

name: DENTIST
quote: Hold still! Nobody's going to hurt you! Oof!

name: DARLA
quote: Fishy? Fishy! Wake up! Wake up!

name: GILL
quote: Quick! To the top of Mt. Wannahockaloogie!

name: DENTIST
quote: What!? All the animals have gone mad!

name: GILL
quote: Sharkbait. Tell your dad..I said..hi. Go get 'em.

name: GURGLE
quote: Is he gonna be okay, Gill?

name: GILL
quote: Don't worry. All drains lead to the ocean.

name: NIGEL
quote: I'm, I'm so sorry. Truly, I am.

name: MARLIN
quote: Dory. If it wasn't for you, I never even would have made it here. So, thank you.

name: DORY
quote: Hey! Hey, wait a minute. W-w-wait! Where are you going?

name: MARLIN
quote: It's over, Dory. We were too late. Nemo's gone and I'm going home now.

name: DORY
quote: No..no, you can't! Stop! Please don't go away. Please? No  one's ever stuck with me for so long before. And if you leave, if you leave...I just,  I remember things better with you. I do. Look, P. Sherman, 42..40..2..agh! I remember it, I  do. It's there, I know it is because when I look at you, I can feel it. And I, I look  at you and...I'm home. Please. I don't want them to go away. I don't wanna forget.

name: MARLIN
quote: I'm sorry, Dory, but I do.

name: CRAB 1/CRAB 2
quote: Hey, hey! Hey! Hey, hey, hey!

name: CRAB 1
quote: Yeah, that's it fella! Just keep on swimmin', you got that!

name: CRAB 2
quote: Too right, mate! Oh, Oh! I got a live one here!

name: NEMO
quote: Hey, have you seen my dad?

name: CRAB 2
quote: Gotcha! Hey! Hey! Come back here!

name: NEMO
quote: Um, excuse me. Are you all right?

name: DORY
quote: I don't know where I am! I don't know what's going on, I think I lost somebody but I, I can't remember.

name: NEMO
quote: It's okay, it's okay. I'm looking for someone too. Hey, we can look together.

name: DORY
quote: Dad! Wait a minute, is it your dad or my dad?

name: DORY
quote: Dad! Dad! Oh. S-ss-syl--shi--Sydney. [gasps] 'P. Sherman, 42 Wallaby Way, Sydney'.

name: DORY
quote: Aaaaah! Nemo! It's you! Aaaaaah! You're Nemo!

name: DORY
quote: Oh! You're Nemo! [gasps] You were dead! I saw you! And then I--[gasps], here you are! I found you! You're not dead! And your father--[gasps]! Your father!

name: NEMO
quote: My father!? You know my father!? Where is he!?

name: DORY
quote: [gasps] This way! He went this way! Quick!

name: DORY
quote: Hey! Have you seen an orange fish swim by? It looks just like him!

name: CRAB 2
quote: Yeah, I saw 'im, bluey! But I'm not tellin' you where he went. And there's no way you're gonna make me!

name: CRAB
quote: Huh!? Aaaah! All right! I'll talk! I'll talk! He went to the fishing grounds! Aaaaah!

name: MARLIN
quote: Sorry. Just trying to get home.

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh, thank goodness! It's all right, son. It's gonna be okay.

name: FISH
quote: Turn around! You're going the wrong way! Aaaaaaaaaaah!

name: NEMO
quote: Dad! I know what to do!

name: NEMO
quote: We have to tell all the fish to swim down together!

name: MARLIN
quote: No, I am not gonna lose you again!

name: NEMO
quote: Dad, there's no time! It's the only way we can save Dory! I can do this!

name: MARLIN
quote: You're right. I know you can.

name: NEMO
quote: Tell all of the fish to swim down!

name: MARLIN
quote: Well!? You heard my son! Come on!

name: NEMO
quote: You have to tell everybody to..

name: MARLIN
quote: ..swim down together! Do you understand what I'm saying to you!? Swim down!

name: NEMO
quote: Come on! You have to swim down!

name: MARLIN
quote: down! Swim down! Swim down! Swim down!

name: MARLIN
quote: Don't give up! Keep swimming! Just keep swimming!

name: FISH
quote: Keep swimming! Keep swimming! Keep swimming!

name: MARLIN
quote: Come on! Let's get to the bottom! Keep swimming!

name: DORY
quote: [singing] Just keep swimming, just keep swimming.

name: FISH
quote: Keep swimming! Keep swimming! Keep swimming! Keep swimming! Yay!

name: MARLIN
quote: Nemo? Nemo? It's okay. Daddy's here, daddy's got you.

name: MARLIN
quote: No, no, no. I'm so sorry, Nemo.

name: MARLIN
quote: Sea turtles? I met one! And he was a hundred and fifty years old.

name: NEMO
quote: 'Cause Sandy Plankton said they only live to be a hundred.

name: MARLIN
quote: Sandy Plankton? Do you think I would cross the entire ocean and not know as much as Sandy Plankton!?

name: MARLIN
quote: He was a hundred and fifty! Not one hundred! Who is this Sandy Plankton who knows everything?

name: MARLIN
quote: Time for school! Time for school! Get up! Let's go! Go!

name: NEMO
quote: No, you're not! I did it! Woohoo! Ha ha ha!

name: MARLIN
quote: Oh! My own son beats me!

name: MARLIN
quote: So just then, the sea cucumber looks over to the mollusk and says : 'with fronds like these, who needs anemones?'!

name: BOB/TED/BILL
quote: Haaa-ha ha ha ha ha ha!

name: BOB
quote: But seriously, Marty, did you really do all the things you say you did?

name: ANCHOR
quote: Oh, we just wanna make sure that our newest member got home safe.

name: BRUCE
quote: Well, we'll see you next week.

name: CHUM
quote: Keep up with the program, Dory.

name: MR. RAY
quote: Hold on! Here we go! Next up, knowledge!

name: NEMO
quote: Bye, dad! Oh! Oh, Mr. Ray! Wait. I forgot something.

name: NEMO
quote: Uh, dad, you can let go now.

name: MARLIN
quote: Sorry! Now go have an adventure!

name: NEMO
quote: See you after school, Dory! Bye, dad!

name: DENTIST
quote: I don't understand it. Here this thing has a lifetime guarantee and it breaks! Had to clean the tank myself, take all the fish out, put 'em in bags and---where'd the fish go?

name: BLOAT
quote: Yeah, that's it! You can do it!

name: PEACH
quote: That's the shortest red light I've ever seen!

name: ALL
quote: Yay! We did it! Ha ha ha ha ha!
